alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 3:46AM PST until February 15 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. These winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow where new snow has fallen, along with reduced visibilities with any additional snow showers. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Blowing and drifting snow will cause reductions to visibility to one mile or less as well as slick and hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
